quotes.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: He who is not a good servant will not be a good master.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: Life must be understood backward. But it must be lived forward.
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: The only thing I know is that I know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Existence precedes essence.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: He who fears death will never do anything worth of a man who is alive.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Man is condemned to be free.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: The function of prayer is not to influence God, but rather to change the nature of the one who prays.
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste much of it.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Education is the kindling of a flame, not the filling of a vessel.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injustice.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It is not enough to possess a talent; one must possess the state of mind that will allow it to develop.
quotes.author: Robert Musil
